page.title: 15 Homelife
page.content: Quality of life is much improved.Most homes have{one car}and other farm vehicles.{Colour TV,computors,videos, {cameras and modern musical instruments feature in todays acceptable style of living.Children are{well clothed}and {fed}and{holiday in summer or winter often abroad.Teenagers follow fashions as dictated by magazines.Boys are as fashion conscious as girls having their hair blow dried at{Unisex shops, they too wear jewellary,parents seem to accept this as normal. Girls are allowed to have their ears pierced at a younger age. Out of 28 primary school girls aged between 4 and 11, only 6 did not have ear-rings. Private{social gambling}thrives in the Card and Domino games.{Plymouth Argyle {football club}has many supporters who buy tickets regularly.{Telephones}like the car are a social necessity.
